name: One revolution after the other
description:
Created for the Godot Wild Jam #22T

this is a 2D rage platformer made with the godot game engine.

You have 4 levels each is 80% harder then the one  before and a timer clock chooses a random wevolution from the revolutions on top of the screen.

For example: reverse the gravity, thus means some levels are playable upside down or speed which changes the player speed to slower or faster.

Credits:

Malthus - Main Programer and Ideas

maltheus.itch.io

MuktadaCreations - Main Artist, Level Design and Visuals in general

muktadacreations.itch.io

Music:

Main Menu Music - Inventing flight

From -> sleepfacingwest.newgrounds.com

Level Music - Street Breaks and AIM Dream Islend

From -> predatormusic.newgrounds.com

Controls:

Gamepad or keyboard
A, D and Space or W for Jump

Used: Godot Version: 3.2.1.stable.official
